title: Provisional resentment
body:
i realize riot have placed new measures to ensure players do not get boosted high into ranked with a lucky promo,
though i just finished mine and after being b1 then demoted to 75 lp b2 end of last season i thought my placement would be a little better. 
i won 8 out of 10 of my matches and believe i did well hoping for a b1 or maybe a s5 placement. i got placed in b2 were i already was. why even bother with a new placement when even with a 8-2 promo do i still take 2 steps backwards.
very unhappy with this.

replies.body:
This means your MMR was probably closer to bronze 5. Your 8 wins brought it back up to Bronze 2 where you were then placed.

Maths does not lie nor does it have feelings.

-SumCoolAid
